doc:
Jon Ewing https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jon_Ewing 0 Jon Douglas Ewing (6 October 1936 - March 2014) was an Australian actor and director best known for his stage work. Ewing was born in Paddington, Sydney and attended Sydney Boys High School. He studied under Hayes Gordon and in 1958 helped to establish the Ensemble Theatre.He played Albin in the 1985 original Australian cast of La Cage aux Folles, for which he received a Green Room Award. Other stage roles include Camelot, Cabaret, Tarantara! Tarantara!, The Threepenny Opera, Candide, The Venetian Twins, Sweeney Todd, Nicholas Nickleby and The Phantom of The Opera.His screen roles include The Last Bastion and Bliss (for which he was nominated for an AFI Award for Best Actor in a Supporting Role). He appeared on TV in Waterloo Station (TV series), Homicide, A Country Practice, The Mavis Bramston Show and Consider Your Verdict. Jon_Douglas_Ewing ( 6_October_1936 - March 2014 ) was an_Australian_actor_and_director best_known for his_stage_work . Ewing was_born in Paddington , Sydney and attended Sydney_Boys_High_School . He studied under Hayes_Gordon and in 1958 helped_to_establish the_Ensemble_Theatre.He played Albin in the_1985_original_Australian_cast of La_Cage_aux_Folles , for which he received a_Green_Room_Award . Other_stage_roles include Camelot , Cabaret , Tarantara ! Tarantara ! , The_Threepenny_Opera , Candide , The_Venetian_Twins , Sweeney_Todd , Nicholas_Nickleby and The_Phantom of The_Opera.His_screen_roles include The_Last_Bastion and Bliss_( for which he was_nominated for an_AFI_Award for_Best_Actor in a_Supporting_Role_) . He appeared on TV in Waterloo_Station_(_TV_series_) , Homicide , A_Country_Practice , The_Mavis_Bramston_Show and Consider Your_Verdict .
